entry.title: SAON
entry.content:
Description

SAON is a Barber Shop Management Software. It is a full-fledged management software ranging from creating stores, franchises, services, products, coupons, etc.

An appointment system was created that is able to be injected in any website, it can schedule services to employees or at available times, as well as a sales statistics with dynamic charts that reflects on product and service sales and employee statistics.

It includes a cash register/checkout system where employees can check-in and perform to-be-done appointments as well as selling products, among many other features.

Technologies used

HTML/CSS/Javascript, AngularJS 1.x, Materialize, Firebase, jQuery and other libraries.
